entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS4Mac needs a runtime API to symbolize managed IPs #61186
    6.0.x
  • Content-Disposition encoding non-ASCII characters #61183
  • Remove unsupported fields from `GeneratedDllImport` #61181
    7.0.0
  • Matrix4x4 class only works on Windows #61178
  • .NET 6.0.0-rc.2 on Raspberry Pi cannot write to writable network file #61175
  • [API Proposal]: EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider support custom key and value mutation #61169
  • ARM32 JIT: Assertion failed '!"NYI: odd sized struct in fgMorphMultiregStructArg"' during 'Morph - Global' #61168
    7.0.0
  • can't parse french dates in alpine docker image while ok in focal #61166
  • Logging methods created by generators allocate if LogLevel is passed #61162
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Specific PInvoke call works with AOT but fails on Interp #61156
  • Vector3.Dot sometimes return 0 instead of correct value in release mode #61154
  • Application threads deadlock when throwing an exception #61151
  • [wasm][debugger] Automatically show the values of the getter of a property. #61149
    7.0.0
  • ShortTimePattern does not respect the system configuration when in macOS #61148
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to evaluate a static class attribute #61147
    7.0.0
  • (Unmanaged) Structs are not considered blittable by Emscripten / Blazor WASM AOT #61146
  • [mono wasm] Passing arguments to entry point not working #61145
  • Enums are not considered blittable by Emscripten / Blazor WASM AOT #61144
  • AppHost requires macOS 10.15 while .net core 3.1 claims to support macOS 10.13+ #61173
    6.0.x
  • Extremly slow build & size explosion of assembly when compiling for WASM in AOT mode #61139
  • load_assembly_and_get_function_pointer_fn returns undocumented error codes #61136
  • [API Proposal]: InlineArrayAttribute #61135

Closed

  • Cancelling GetHostEntryOrAddressesCoreAsync may cause an unobserved Task Exception event #61180
  • ValueTask.s_canceledTask can be disposed #61167
  • Dev Container: onCreateCommand failed #60807
  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't work with nullable enable at the csproj level #61174
  • [Runtime Store] conflict with dotnet command line #61103
  • JIT: Invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61077
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun + WPF + PublishTrimmed=true does not generate valid executable #60936
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Hashing.Tests.HashAlgorithmTest.ComputeHashAsync_SupportsCancellation #61138
  • FileSystemWatcher does not fire when file changes #60417
    Future
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection in HTTP header code #59549
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to await a SynchronizationContext or a TaskScheduler #61133
  • Half operator < (smaller) not working correctly #61141
  • Question about of using goto in switch case of Linq.Where #61150
  • Boxing elimination doesn't work in generic method specified with a generic struct which is specified with a reference type. #13445
    Future
  • Look at throw helpers in ?? contexts #2233
    Future
  • Double.CompareTo() performance hurt by not being inlined #56493
    7.0.0
  • Allow customizing letter case size when serializing Unicode characters #60762
  • Issue with HttpClient using it on PUT/POST verbs on aspnet core 2.1 #59692
    7.0.0
  • WCF on Linux is unable to create Channel #59681
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Set IL offsets for calls created during devirtualization #61189
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DllImportGenerator] Fix stub generation for char array marshalling #61188
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Fixed ILVerify incorrectly flagging valid default interface implementations #61185
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Convert to OleDb assembly and last Cryptography DllImport to GeneratedDllImport #61184
    area-System.Data.OleDB, 7.0.0
  • Remove BestFitMapping, CallingConvention, and ThrowOnUnmappableChar from GeneratedDllImportAttribute #61182
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • JIT: slightly more aggressive tail duplication #61179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use constant ids for RoArrayType GetMethodsCore #61177
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #61176
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Help wanted] added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Assertion failed 'ins == INS_add' for madd/msub #61171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] MultiplexedConnection mockup #61170
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Applied @marek-safar review to exit the loop once the condition is fulfilled. #61165
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • improved BDD Unicode table representation in NonBacktracking engine #61142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Fold S.S.C.Encoding into new System.Security.Cryptography library #61137
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0

Merged

  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 2 #61010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: limited version of forward substitution for some relops #61023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Add hidden attribute support #61143
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deduplicate tests with class name 'BringUpTest' #61128
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Deduplicate runtime tests using the class name 'Test' #61125
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Credential fixes #61114
    area-System.Net
  • Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60854
  • Skip sys/sysctl.h on linux in mono #61110
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] simplify startup configuration #61072
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix dump generation issues for VS4Mac #61063
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #61111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Adding support for X86Base.Pause() and ArmBase.Yield() #61065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix value numbering of field assignments #61113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Recognize sbfiz/ubfiz idioms #61045
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, no recent activity, community-contribution
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #61079
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Detect infinite generic expansion #776
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question - implicit truncation of longs? #1688
  • HTTP/2 #1690
  • HTTP proxy #1697
  • Header parsing/printing #1696
  • Authentication #1695
  • Connection pooling #1694
  • Automatic redirect #1693
  • Automatic decompression #1692
  • HTTP/3 #1691

PullRequests

Merged

  • Detect generic recursion in generic lookups #1699

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] : Add support for more helpers #1683

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Consume NuGet /embed assets group for interop type assemblies from NuGet package #2732
    6.0.2xx
  • Real support for shared projects (shproj/projitems) #2511

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove OpCodes from event source to make events appear correctly #22458
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22457
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime. #22373
  • Fix version parsing that depended on current culture #22364
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update branding for 5.0.404 #22445
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Versions.props for 6.0.101 and servicing #22442
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Update branding for 3.1.416 #22443
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 5.0.210 #22444
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup NoWarn duplication by moving its handling to the Suppression Engine #22426
    Area-Compatibility
  • Re-enable a couple of old tests that were left disabled. #22381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the non-windows test builds to also run helix and non-helix in parallel. #22284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tool install implicit RIDs #22331
    Area-Tools
  • Treat SDK previews as separate workload feature bands #22446
    Area-Workloads
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22430
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Infra] (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Restore) Failed to retrieve information about 'Microsoft.VisualStudio.GraphModel' #57565
  • Convert to block scoped code fix produces incorrect output if namespace declaration is inside a ifdef #57564
  • Test failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Emit.UnitTests.dll #57560
  • Avoid using Document snapshot in perf-sensitive command handlers #57554
  • Explore moving source parsing to async open file operation #57553
  • Flaky test: Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpFindReferences.FindReferencesToCtor #57552
  • Flaky test: Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.FastDoubleInvoke #57551
  • Code document not recognized in tooltip for anonymous functions #57550
  • AutoCorrect wrong when using aliasses #57546
  • DetachedDefinitionItem retains large working sets #57544
  • Warnings are not treated as errors even if all settings are set correctly #57539

Closed

  • Test failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer.UnitTests.Miscellaneous.LspMiscellaneousFilesWorkspaceTests.TestLooseFile_MovedToRegisteredWorkspace #57555
  • IDE0008 not configurable through .editorconfig #57545
  • Source Generators: design-time completion/intellisense and Target Framework not work #55199
    17.1
  • [SourceLink] Use PEReader to try to read pdbs #57417
  • Are significant numbers of OperationCanceledException in RoslynCodeAnalysisService normal? Is SolutionChecksumUpdater being too aggressive? #54892
    17.1
  • GetFullyLoadedOpenDocumentInCurrentContextWithChanges hangs #57250
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57563
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57561
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix line delta calculation for top-level code #57556
    Area-Interactive
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the progress API shape to make it easier to mark a set of work as complete. #57547
    Area-IDE
  • Validate the checksum of source on disk #57541
    Area-IDE
  • Have navto only search generated-documents after doing the search of regular documents. #57538
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust the order of evaluation for implicit Index/Range support to follow the recent LDM decision. #57535
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57536
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert move to VS2022 for official build. #57558
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert move to VS2022 for official build. #57559
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert move to VS2022 for official build. #57557
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57540
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add Visual Studio 2022 Editor Color Scheme #57138
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57521
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized missing warning message #57296 #57502
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify PDB reading code #57537
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57462
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Simplify nav-to implementation. #57534
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cache the stale syntax-indices we load prior to OOP being fully hydrated. #57514
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57530
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update SymReader packages to the latest #57458
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57506
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers
  • Track AbstractFlowPass.PendingBranches by label #57520
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57070
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Refactor indentation API #57529
    Area-IDE
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Fix spacing when generating editorconfig options from UI #54601
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #57481
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • proposed document pull diagnostics implementation #57518
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove OPT_NO_FTS and OPT_NO_LTS from Installers #38077
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Update project templates to use DateOnly instead of DateTime where appropriate #38075
  • VS 2022 Preview 7, Asp.net 6, New Blazor Server Project with Periods in Project Name Fails to Build #38074
  • VS2022 RC2 Building Blazor error reporting not working well #38072
  • Blazor wasm size reduction #38071
  • VS2022 RC3 Blazor errors in _Imports.razor repeated 100 times #38070
  • VS2022 RC3 Blazor compilation errors showing only in generated .razor.g.cs files and not in my code #38069
  • Startup improvement: connectionclosehttps #38067
  • Startup regression: connectionclosehttps, mapaction, mvc #38066
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #38065
  • New Item Templates and Implicit Global Usings #38063
    Backlog
  • Using UsePathBase with querystring from root throws exception #38058
  • optional renderfragment cause compiler error RZ9996 #38056
  • Not posible to get RequestTimedOut from Kestrel middleware. #38053
  • 'dotnet watch run' for a console app keeps restarting after one modification #38064
  • Startup improvement: mapaction #38052
  • Change visibility of IRemoteAuthenticationPathsProvider in Blazor WebAssembly to implement custom OAuth2 #38048
  • Add configuration option to `RedisCache` to allow read-only access #38046
    Backlog

Closed

  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter: Deserialize error handling #37977
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Feature Request] Better support Dependency Inversion with SignalR Core #38007
  • Need to document that stopPropagation refers to Blazor's delegated events, not native DOM events #30199
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Perf regression: caching, mapaction, single_query #37951
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #38050
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext #38051
  • Feature request: Allow `DataProtection` API to protect some data using a specific key #38055
  • Blazor Server Page Refresh/Scroll ? #38057
  • ReactRedux project template npm install EJSONPARSE failure #37287
    5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Invalid json in package.json for the reactredux template #37520
    5.0.x
  • Can't launch Blazor WebAssembly sample apps from VS within this repo code #37514
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Found malformed component comment in Blazor WebAssembly app with prerendering #38049
  • Can not use BaseIntermediateOutputPath with v5.0.8 #37958
  • How to authorize SignalR Hub for both Identity Role OR JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme? #38039
  • Perf regression: caching #37996
  • AuthTest.AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized() #33657
    6.0-docs-infra

PullRequests

Created

  • Use file scoped namespaces #38076
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Components E2E Test Execution Instructions #38073
    Docs, area-blazor
  • Guard access failed calls #38068
    area-identity
  • Add WebApi-CSharp Template Toggle Description (#37367) #38062
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.x
  • Make RoleStore protected virtual #38061
    area-identity
  • Use the RawConnectionId for HttpSys #38059
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Improve exception messages for missing auth services #38045
    area-security

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `a575301` to `ffdec25` #37983
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Modify Mvc.Analyzer tests to use Roslyn test infrastructure #38010
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Special case X.Y.1 in Directory.Build.targets.in #38047
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Chrome and Selenium Versions #38024
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies #37739
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.13
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #38027
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Unquarantine `AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized` #37717
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37881
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • [release/5.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37818
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 5.0.13
  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37879
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.13
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37980
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.13

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #38042
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 2.1.31
  • [release/3.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37969
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 3.1.22
  • [release/5.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37968
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 5.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37967
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.1
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37966
    area-runtime
  • Fix groupIdentity in protobuf template #37919
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37848
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Add Server2022 to helix matrix & quarantine jobs #37918
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Fix for remember browser #38040
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ContentProperty attribute ignored if base type is a Collection #3251
  • Ensure Images handle DPI changes on Windows #3250
  • [Bug] [Android] RefreshView not resizing #3248
  • [Bug] Some input files use or override a deprecated API, Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details #3245
  • [Spec] Changes in Team API Review meetings #3244
  • Project reference with target framework specified fails to resolve and build within VS IDE whereas same thing works fine in .NET CLI #3243
  • MAUI Need receipe on android when uncomment windows project #3242
  • Xml version will be in Android manifest handled as Androoid version code #3241
  • .NET MAUI preview 9: Info.plist changes ignored #3240
  • versioncode 1.0 is invalid #3239
  • Missing Packages when ".NET MAUI App (Preview)" project is created #3238
  • XAML Hot Reload not working running MAUI app on Windows Machine #3237
  • .NET MAUI Entry Text only use the value assigned not the typed value (VS2022 Preview 7) #3236
  • Workload Repair failed: `dotnet workload repair - MAUI #3235

Closed

  • [Bug] WinUI CollectionView is selecting the first item in the list on load #3192
  • [Enhancement] Allow to invalidate GraphicsView #3140

PullRequests

Created

  • Swap order of ContentProperty and collection checks #3252
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • [Housekeeping] Created settings page in the .NET MAUI Gallery #3247
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Add missing UpdateItemsSource override #3228
  • Automated dotnet-format update #3234
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix path separator to work on mac for clean cake target #3230
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • WinUI3 Interop for share and file picker #3232
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Setup first set of Automation Properties #3222
    area/a11y

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Make ScalarSubqueryExpression fully immutable #26532
  • Incorrect Entry when catching DBUpdateException #26530
  • Register a scoped `DbContext` automatically when using `AddPooledDbContextFactory` as well #26528
  • Using `GroupBy` with auto-generated expression passed to `Select` throws an exception in RC1 and RC2 #26525
  • EfCore incorrect SQL when altering column with type #26523
  • End-user way to add custom sql expression #26522
  • EF Core owned entity shadow PK causes null constraint violation with SQLite #26521

Closed

  • Related property key value resets when attaching a disconnected entity. #26490
  • Why the order of adding entities is not preserved?! #26524

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Cleanup regarding TODO notes #26533
    auto-merge
  • [6.0.1] RevEng: Consider skip navigation names when generating identifier for… #26531
    Servicing-consider
  • [6.0.1] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Clean up on application exit #26529
    Servicing-consider
  • Evolve null-checking approach in extensions #26527
  • Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
  • [6.0.1] Avoid NRE in ForeignKeyAttributeConvention #26520
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.21.0 to 3.22.1 #26503
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26518
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26516
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26515
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore.InMemory #26509

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FreeBSD install error cannot execute binary file: Exec format error #12601

Closed

  • In VS move baseline manifests to separate msis #12352
  • dotnet-hosting-3.1.8-win.exe uses unsigned WIX installer components #10548

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12602
  • Bundle workload manifests as separate MSIs #12600

Merged

  • Update ulimit #12576
  • Update branding for servicing and 101 #12590
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12594
  • Update branding for 3.1.416 #12591
  • Update branding for 5.0.210 #12592
  • Update branding for 5.0.404 #12593

Updated

  • We keep getting this config file added by the insertion pipeline and it fails the build. #12554
  • Update to 6.0 in our wxl files as that was reverted a while back. #12550
  • GetRuntimeInformation.targets: determine PortableProductMonikerRid based on OSName and Architecture. #12516
  • [release/5.0.2xx] update Asp.Net templates #12595
  • [release/5.0.4xx] update Asp.Net templates #12596
  • [release/6.0.1xx] update Asp.Net templates #12597
  • [release/6.0.2xx] update Asp.Net templates #12598
  • Update Asp.Net template versions #12599
